thread.title: Buy-to-let: The chart that shows the best way to make money
thread.title_full: Buy-to-let: The chart that shows the best way to make money

author: Nicole Blackmore
title: Buy-to-let: The chart that shows the best way to make money
text: Buy-to-let Buy-to-let: The chart that shows the best way to make money Carving houses up into multiple dwellings generates returns 40pc higher than letting them as single properties, new research finds HMOs achieved a total return on equity of 108%, compared to 77% for standard buy-to-let properties. Photo: Alex Segre / Alamy
